text: geulihayeo geuneun dongsaeng-ui annang eul josahagi jeon-e hyeongjedeul-ui annang eul josahayeo machimnae geuui hyeongjae annang-eseo geugeos-eul kkeonaeeossdeola geuleohgehayeo hananim-eun yoseb-eulo hayeo gye hoeg-eul gajge haess-eum-ila geuneun geuui hyeongjeleul wang-ui beob-eul jeog-yongchi aniha go hananim-ui tteus-e matgyeossdeola hana nim-eun geubun-i uliga wonhaneun ja-e ge eunhyeleul buyeohasini hananim-eun eotteohan jisigboda wie gyesinila
